name: Мыло жидкое Synergetic Мелисса и ромашка чистота и ультразащита 99.9%, 500мл
ingredients: Purify water with silver ion, sodium laureth sulfate, sodium lauroamphoacetate, PEG-4 rapeseedamide, glycerin, sea salt, undecylenamidopropyltrimonium methosulfate, 2-phenoxyethanol, nonallergenic parfume with natural oils, candida bombicola/glucose/methyl rapeseedate ferment, citric acid, melaleuca alternafolia (tea tree) leaf oil, eucalyptus globulus leaf oil, thymus vulgaris (thyme) flower/leaf oil, anthemis nobilis flower oil, melissa officinalis essential oil, vitamin complex (A, E, F): ethyl linoleate, isopropyl myristate, cetearyl ethylhexanoate, triticum vulgare germ oil, retinyl palmitate, retinyl acetate, tocopheryl acetate, food dyes (tartrazine, brilliant blue).
